creator: Amrut Deshmukh
descriptionHtml:
I strongly believe "If I'm not reading, I'm not changing. If I'm not changing, I'm not growing."

Do you believe in my belief? If yes, welcome to Mission Make India Read!

- Booklet Guy

How to make best use of Booklet app:

1) If you see the dancing Booklet logo, you can access to all the summaries that are added to Booklet House till date.

2) If you see a sad cartoon face, it means you need to keep reading/ listening to existing Booklet until you get the dancing logo. (see screenshot 1)

3) You can download a new Booklet in 2 different ways:

a) By searching in Booklet House through the search bar (see screenshot 2) or

b) Use Booklet Guy's recommendation by scratching the card (see screenshot 3)

c) Using "Categories". But only those with Reading IQ of 20 or above get this privilege.

Happy Reading!

- Booklet Guy


Why do we ask for these permissions in the app?

1) Access to Media & Storage: So that we can store the book cover images and audio files.

2) To manage phone calls:  If you get a call while you are listening to an audio summary, we need to stop the audio immediately. Else audio will keep playing while you are speaking on the phone.

3) Access to camera: To enable you to upload your profile pic

We do not intend to intrude into your privacy. We shall maintain utmost integrity and honesty while taking care of your reading life. Make India read is a mission and not a business. Please feel safe to allow the permissions.
descriptionShort: A burning desire to cultivate reading habit amongst the youth

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Read O Meter has new meaning ,you will now be rewarded for a consistent reading life.
2. A cool new graph and progress tracking in the profile will show you how consistent you are with your reading.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Read O Meter has new meaning ,you will now be rewarded for a consistent reading life.
2. A cool new graph and progress tracking in the profile will show you how consistent you are with your reading.
3. Bug Fixes

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: The gates of Mission Make India Read will be closed henceforth. A new reader can join the mission only with the help of a KEY given by the existing reader who is already part of the mission.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
You can now read as many tiny Booklets as you want. Not just one per day. Select your fav ideas and print your own book.
Initiative to help needy readers on scratch card page

Why do we ask for these permissions in the app?

1) Access to Media & Storage: So that we can store the book cover images and audio files.

2) To manage phone calls:  If you get a call while you are listening to an audio summary, we need to stop the audio immediately. Else audio will keep playing while you are speaking on the phone.

3) Access to camera: To enable you to upload your profile pic

We do not intend to intrude into your privacy. We shall maintain utmost integrity and honesty while taking care of your reading life. Make India read is a mission and not a business. Please feel safe to allow the permissions.
descriptionShort: A burning desire to cultivate reading habit amongst the youth
title: Booklet - Mission Make India Read

creator: Amrut Deshmukh
descriptionHtml:
I strongly believe "If I'm not reading, I'm not changing. If I'm not changing, I'm not growing."

Do you believe in my belief? If yes, welcome to Mission Make India Read!

- Booklet Guy

How to make best use of Booklet app:

1) If you see the dancing Booklet logo, you can access to all the summaries that are added to Booklet House till date.

2) If you see a sad cartoon face, it means you need to keep reading/ listening to existing Booklet until you get the dancing logo. (see screenshot 1)

3) You can download a new Booklet in 2 different ways:

a) By searching in Booklet House through the search bar (see screenshot 2) or

b) Use Booklet Guy's recommendation by scratching the card (see screenshot 3)

c) Using "Categories". But only those with Reading IQ of 20 or above get this privilege.

Happy Reading!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Making things simple is complicated. Booklet is now much more simpler and leaner.

- Read Tiny Booklets as social media stories

- share booklets on WhatsApp

- book-shelf removed

title: Booklet - Mission Make India R

creator: Amrut Deshmukh
descriptionHtml:
The foundation of Mission Make India Read is my personal belief - "If I'm not reading, I'm not changing. If I'm not changing, I'm not growing."

- Booklet Guy

Read / listen to one Booklet upto 100% and become eligible for a new Booklet. Read 1, Get 1

The first row has unlimited stories I have extracted from books I read. Swipe left to read the next story.

Click on “More Books” to download new Booklet (if you are eligible)

Why do we ask for these permissions in the app?

1) Access to Media & Storage: So that we can store the book cover images and audio files.

2) To manage phone calls: If you get a call while you are listening to an audio summary, we need to stop the audio immediately. Else audio will keep playing while you are speaking on the phone.

3) Access to camera: To enable you to upload your profile pic

We do not intend to intrude into your privacy. We shall maintain utmost integrity and honesty while taking care of your reading life. Make India read is a mission and not a business. Please feel safe to allow the permissions.
descriptionShort: A burning desire to cultivate reading habit amongst the youth

- Read Tiny Booklets as social media stories

- share booklets on WhatsApp

descriptionShort: A burning desire to cultivate reading habit amongst the youth
title:
Booklet - Make India Read
5.2.3

creator: Amrut Deshmukh
descriptionHtml:
The foundation of Mission Make India Read is my personal belief - "If I am not reading, I am not changing. If I am not changing, I am not growing."

- Booklet Guy

Read / listen to one Booklet upto 100% and become eligible for a new Booklet. Read 1, Get 1

The first row has unlimited stories I have extracted from books I read. Swipe left to read the next story.

Click on “More Books” to download new Booklet (if you are eligible)

Why do we ask for these permissions in the app?

1) Access to Media & Storage: So that we can store the book cover images and audio files.

2) To manage phone calls: If you get a call while you are listening to an audio summary, we need to stop the audio immediately. Else audio will keep playing while you are speaking on the phone.

3) Access to camera: To enable you to upload your profile pic

We do not intend to intrude into your privacy. We shall maintain utmost integrity and honesty while taking care of your reading life. Make India read is a mission and not a business. Please feel safe to allow the permissions.
descriptionShort: A burning desire to cultivate reading habit amongst the youth
